name: 11' Inflatable Stand-Up Paddle Board – Available 33"/34"/35" Extra Wide Inflatable Paddle Board with SUP Accessories, Camera Mount, Basic All-Around SUP Board for All Skill Levels, Up to 500lbs
short_description: 🌊 Stable & Beginner-Friendly Design 🌊 This 11ft inflatable stand-up paddle board offers extra width for superior stability, perfect for beginners, families, and SUP enthusiasts. With a weight capacity of 450lbs, it’s great for solo adventures or 2-person paddle board fun on lakes, rivers, or oceans.

🌊 Durable & Lightweight Build 🌊 Made with military-grade PVC and advanced drop-stitch technology, this portable paddle board resists wear and tear for long-lasting performance. Its non-slip EVA deck ensures comfort and safety, even for yoga paddle boarding or fishing SUP outings.

🌊 Quick Inflation & Multi-Purpose Use 🌊 Inflate your paddle board in under 10 minutes with the upgraded dual-action pump. Whether practicing yoga SUP, cruising the coastline, or exploring with friends, its wide surface is built for stable and versatile experiences, including multi-person paddle board adventures.

🌊 Complete Accessories for Every Adventure 🌊 Comes with an adjustable paddle, 3 detachable fins, SUP ankle leash, waterproof phone bag, high-efficiency dual-action pump，and a durable travel backpack. Lightweight and easy to carry, it’s perfect for family outings, weekend camping by the water, or spontaneous day trips.

🌊Size Notice 🌊 11' × 34" × 6" –All dimensions are manually measured, and slight variations may occur. Minor shrinkage during production is normal, so the final width may vary slightly depending on the model. Rest assured, each board is built to meet stability standards and deliver a smooth, enjoyable paddling experience.
product_description: D3SEA - Ride the Waves, Embrace Adventure D3SEA is an innovative brand specializing in inflatable SUP boards, inspired by a deep love for the sea. The unique "3" in our name mirrors a "D," symbolizing our adventurous spirit and relentless pursuit of innovation. We craft lightweight, durable, and eco-friendly paddleboards for all skill levels, perfect for both tranquil lakes and exhilarating ocean waves. By merging cutting-edge design with sustainable practices, we strive to protect our natural waters while delivering an unparalleled paddling experience.

name: Inflatable Paddle Boards Stand Up Paddleboard Wide Stable with Premium SUP Paddle Board Accessories for All Skill Levels with Fins, Adjustable Paddle, Pump, Backpack, Leash

name: SLOOSH Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board, 10'6" Paddle Boards with Premium Accessories, Non-Slip EVA Deck, Ultra-Light Carry Bag Pump, Ripple SUP for Youth & Adults of All Skill Levels
short_description: Effortless Balance & Smooth Ride for Beginners: The Ripple 10'6" inflatable paddle board makes learning easy with a round nose and wide tail offer exceptional stability and control. At 33" wide, this stand up paddle board strikes the perfect balance – significantly more stable than narrow 32" paddle boards yet easier to paddle than bulky 35" models. The tri-fin setup helps you stay on course and make turns effortlessly, even if it’s your first time on this inflatable SUP.

Bring Your Kid, Pet, or Gear – Holds 450 LBS: Built for versatility, this blue paddle board for adults supports up to 450 pounds. Whether you're paddling solo, with your child, dog, or carrying extra fishing paddle board gear, stability is assured. Enjoy relaxing family outings or pet-friendly adventures on this blow up paddle board for adults without worrying about tipping. Perfect sup board for shared experiences.

FortaFusion Tech – Durable & Rigid Like Hard Boards: Our inflatable stand up paddle board features proprietary FortaFusion Technology. An ultra-durable core fused with double-layer mesh-reinforced sidewalls withstands bumps, scrapes, and years of adventure. Inflate this standup paddle board inflatable to 20 PSI (recommended 12-15 PSI) for a rock-solid, rigid inflatable paddle board feel that rivals hard boards, yet remains lightweight and portable.

Easy to Carry & Comfortable to Transport:Take this inflatable paddle board anywhere effortlessly. Three reinforced handles (front, center, rear) make carrying a breeze. Going the distance? The included backpack features full padding on shoulders, waist, and back for all-day comfort, letting you transport your sup paddle board and full kit without strain. Portability defines this blow up paddle board.

Inflates 30% Faster with Dual-Action Pump:Spend less time pumping and more time paddling. The included dual-action pump fills this inflatable SUP quickly in double-action mode (low pressure), then switches to single-action for smooth high-pressure pumping – cutting inflation time by 30% for your stand up paddle board inflatable. Get your sup board ready faster.

Complete Kit, Ready for Adventure: Everything needed comes included. This standup paddle board package features a lightweight, adjustable paddle board for effortless gliding. Stay secure with the ankle leash and protect valuables in the waterproof phone pouch. Three removable fins offer customizable performance. All paddle boards essentials fit neatly into the travel backpack. Great base for fishing paddle board setups.

1-Year Worry-Free Warranty: We stand behind the Ripple SUP with a 1-year limited warranty and responsive support. Paddle confidently on your inflatable blue paddle boards for adults, knowing we've got you covered for worry-free adventures on the water.

name: Niphean (Extra Large) Inflatable Paddle Board, SUP for 2+1 People/Family, Stand Up Paddle Board with (Beginner Friendly) StabilTrac Fin, Waterproof Phone Pouch, Paddle Boards for Adults, Gift Ideas
short_description: 【3 Year Manufactures Warranty】- Niphean is dedicated to providing unparalleled customer service to all of tje customers. Each Niphean product comes with a 30-day return policy and a 3-year warranty at no additional cost to ensure complete satisfaction. If there is any issue with the inflatable stand up paddle board, please don't hesitate to contact Niphean.

【Enhanced Size and Super Stable】- Niphean inflatable paddle board measures 11' x 33" x 6" weighing 19 lbs, with a capacity over 500 lbs. With its larger detachable balanced fin in the center, this inflatabel sup provides enhanced stability during paddling, allowing for smooth straight-line navigation. Even blow up paddle board beginners will find it easy to use. The EVA deck of blow up paddle boards is textured with grooves for superior slip resistance and a comfortable foot grip.

【Attention to Quality and Durability】- Quality is the top priority. Niphean inflatable paddle boards are crafted from premium materials. It is designed to be a durable and long-lasting stand up paddle boards for adults of all skill levels, and also perfect to bring furry friends along on adventures. From initial design to production process, Niphean ensures that every aspect of the sup board meets the highest standards.

【Dive into Water Directly】- Niphean paddle board inflatable comes with all the necessary sup accessories to get started right away, including 1 adjustable paddle, 4 detachable fins, 1 safety leash, 1 pump, 1 sup backpack, 1 waterproof phone bag, 1 repair kit, and a cup holder. There are 15 D-rings on Niphean paddle board, which add functionality such as installing a kayak seat for fishing, securing a cooler or connecting with other paddleboard through these D rings.

【Versatility for Various Scenarios】-The paddleboards are equipped with two multifunctional mounts, for attaching accessories like camera mounts, cup holders, and fishing rod holders. The nose and tail of the board feature bungee cords, offering customization options to suit different preferences. This inflatable sup can be used in various water conditions, such as the ocean, lake, and river, and is versatile enough for yoga, surfing, exploring, traveling, and fishing.

short_description: All the accessories you need - The “Enjoyer - Full Pack” collection includes: blue stand up paddle board, backpack, leash, pump, dual-use aluminum paddle, 3 fins, kayak seat, footrest, carry strap, repair kit, 5L dry bag, phone case and holder
Paddleboarding and kayak, 2 in 1 - With a kayak seat and footrest to transform your sup board into an inflatable kayak. 10ft wide paddle board with seat for enjoying solo or with family

Strength and durability - Inflatable paddle boards for adults with airtight military-grade PVC coating and double sidewall layer for protection to prevent air leaks. Equipped with a high quality valve that is easy to use

product_description: Inflatable paddle board - Huiike Our paddle boards for adults includes everything you need to turn your water adventure into a fantastic experience. What’s included? - Sup board - Measures 120 x 33 x 5,90 inches and supports up to 286,6 lb of weight. - Safety Leash - Mandatory for ensuring your safety at all times. - Manual Pump - Dual-action pump that can be used for both inflation and deflation of the board. - Dual-Use Paddle - The paddle consists of 3 pieces with an adjustable height from 170 to 220cm. The handle piece can be removed to add an additional blade, transforming it into a kayak paddle. - Backpack and Transport Strap - For easy transportation. - 3 Fins - Includes one large center fin and two smaller side fins for improved maneuverability. They are removable to prevent damage during storage. - Kayak Seat and Foot Support - Allows you to convert the paddle board into an inflatable kayak for a different experience. - Repair Kit - Includes a patch for fixing any punctures and a valve tightening key. Please note that glue is not included. - 5L Waterproof Bag - For storing your essentials during your outings. - Waterproof Mobile Phone Case - Can be worn around your neck to keep your phone safe and dry. - Phone Holder - Want to capture your unforgettable moments on the water? You can attach your phone to the camera mount on the board using the phone holder. - Manual in your language - Provides all the necessary information for setup and proper maintenance.

name: Daisy 11'6’ × 35” Extra Wide Paddle Board with Seat, One-Stop Premium SUP Board Accessories, Tailored 5 Fins, Stable Stand Up Paddle Boards for Youth of All Skill Levels
short_description: More Balance - The iTAOSTAR Daisy paddle board (11'6" long, 35" wide) supports up to 430 lbs, ideal for solo, family, & pet paddling with great balance for all skill levels

More Fun - Exclusively from iTAOSTAR, our five tailored fins (3 central + 2 side fins) adapt to various scenrios, offering diverse balance and zero fin-loss worries. Dive into personalized paddleboarding fun without limits

More Adventure - Our innovative combo transforms the iSUP into a kayak with an inflatable seat (color random) & foam footrest, offering enduring comfort and unparalleled adaptability for paddling escapade
More Exciting - Capture Every Adventure with Our Camera Mount, Designed for Action Cameras and Phone Adapters. Enhance Your Ride with the iTAOSTAR Flag Waving Vibrantly at the Board's Forefront

Tailored One-Stop Accessories - Our iSUP set features more stuff than others, which include an adjustable paddle with kayak kit, 5 fins, seat, footrest, double-action pump, shoulder strap, ankle leash, waterproof pouch, 120L backpack, 10L dry bag, cup holder, flag, whistle, valve wrench, and manual
4th Gen paddle - Experience Powerful Strokes with Our 4th Gen Dual-Rib Paddle Blades! The Dual-Latch Design Ensures No Wobble, also equipped the Kayak Conversion kit

120L Backpack - Our top-notch pack features a spacious front pocket & two sides for all gear. Secure board with internal strap, store pumps, fins, fishing kits upfront, paddles on sides. And still roomy for more. Ergonomic, adjustable straps fit for everyone

Efficient Dual-Action Pump with Sensitive Gauge - Our pump inflates in just 5-10 minutes and deflates in 2-3, featuring a sensitive gauge that accurately measures psi once the paddle board is fully shaped. Initial use may require some patience for optimal readings

Convenient Multi-functional Cup Holder - The iTAOSTAR paddle board includes a cup holder for drinks, bottles, snacks, and even your phone, ensuring you stay hydrated and energized on hot days. It also allows for bait suspension and is a stable fishing paddle board

Industry-Leading Comprehensive User Guide - Our paddleboards come with the most detailed and thorough instructions to ensure a seamless first-time experience on the water. Read the manual carefully before use for safety and enjoyment
